name: Retouch4me
description: Retouch4me provides AI-powered plugins and standalone apps for professional photo and video retouching, designed for ease and natural results.
longDescription: Retouch4me is a suite of AI-powered tools designed to simplify and enhance photo and video retouching for photographers and retouchers. It offers plugins for Adobe Photoshop and standalone applications that automate complex retouching tasks while preserving natural skin textures and delivering professional-grade results. The platform caters to both beginners and professionals, streamlining workflows for fashion, beauty, portrait, and headshot editing. Its cloud-based and on-device processing options provide flexibility, requiring minimal user effort to achieve high-quality outcomes. Retouch4me aims to save time by automating tedious tasks, allowing users to focus on creative aspects of their work. The suite includes specialized tools like Heal, Dodge&Burn, and Apex, each targeting specific retouching needs.
features: Retouch4me Heal automatically detects and corrects minor skin defects like blemishes and enlarged pores, preserving natural skin texture for professional results.
Retouch4me Dodge&Burn applies high-end retouching techniques to smooth skin imperfections and enhance portraits non-destructively with a Soft Light layer.
Retouch4me Apex integrates 11 AI-powered retouching tools into one cloud-based interface, offering real-time previews and flexible adjustments.
The Retouch4me Panel allows users to apply multiple plugins simultaneously, speeding up workflows by up to five times without navigating complex menus.
Retouch4me Color Match Free provides access to a LUT Cloud library, enabling users to apply and adjust color filters for creative photo enhancement.
Cloud Retouching offers 20 free retouches, allowing users to process entire photoshoots with multiple plugins applied at once.
Batch processing capabilities enable efficient retouching of large photo sets, ideal for professional photographers handling high-volume projects.
Plugins operate both as Photoshop extensions and standalone apps, providing flexibility for users with or without Photoshop.
Non-destructive editing ensures original images remain intact, with results exported as adjustable layers for further customization.
The platform supports group shots, automatically retouching multiple subjects in one click, saving time on manual edits.

faqs.question: What is Retouch4me?
faqs.answer: Retouch4me is a suite of AI-powered plugins and standalone apps designed to automate professional photo and video retouching, preserving natural textures.

faqs.question: Does Retouch4me offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Retouch4me provides 20 free retouches through its Cloud Retouching service and a free Color Match plugin for LUT-based editing.

faqs.question: Can Retouch4me plugins work without Photoshop?
faqs.answer: Yes, Retouch4me offers standalone applications that function independently, though plugins are optimized for Photoshop workflows.

faqs.question: What types of images are best suited for Retouch4me?
faqs.answer: Retouch4me excels in fashion, beauty, portrait, and headshot images, delivering natural results with minimal effort.

faqs.question: How does Retouch4me Apex differ from other plugins?
faqs.answer: Apex combines 11 AI tools in a single cloud-based interface with real-time previews, simplifying complex retouching tasks.

faqs.question: Is Retouch4me suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, its intuitive one-click tools make it accessible for beginners while offering advanced features for professional retouchers.

faqs.question: Does Retouch4me support batch processing?
faqs.answer: Yes, Retouch4me allows batch processing, enabling users to retouch multiple images simultaneously for efficient workflows.

faqs.question: Are updates to Retouch4me plugins free?
faqs.answer: With a perpetual license, users pay once and receive updates without additional costs, depending on the plugin.
